com.satispay.protocore.persistence

Class MemoryPersistenceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.satispay.protocore.persistence.MemoryPersistenceManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SecurePersistenceManager

    public class MemoryPersistenceManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements SecurePersistenceManager
    Created by domenicovisconti on 26/04/16. Here is a simple implementation of a secure persistence manager !!WARN!! this implementation does not persist data in a safe and secure way it just use a HashMap to save data in memory, killing the application the saved data will be lost.

      • Fields inherited from interface com.satispay.protocore.persistence.SecurePersistenceManager

      • clearData

        public void clearData()
        Description copied from interface: SecurePersistenceManager
        This method is triggered when the session is finished. This means a 401 HTTP error is received. It could be triggers also manually if a logout process is needed by the implementor.
